public abstract class FileServerWriteRequest
extends FileServerRequest
Abstract class representing a FileServerRequest to write to specific resources.

    • coveredByPolicy

      public boolean coveredByPolicy​(@NotNull @NotNull RTreePolicy policy)
      Description copied from class: FileServerRequest
      Method to check if a user is allowed to perform a certain FileServerRequest, given the access control RTreePolicy of that user for the file server.
      Specified by:
      coveredByPolicy in class FileServerRequest
      Parameters:
      policy - The RTreePolicy of the user.
      Returns:
